snippet: After 22 years with the Asia Society, Vishakha N. Desai will step down as president.
abstract: Vishakha N Desai steps down as president and chief executive of the Asia Society.

byline.original: By ROBIN POGREBIN; Compiled by DAVE ITZKOFF

lead_paragraph: After 22 years with the Asia Society, Vishakha N. Desai will step down as president.

headline.main: Head of Asia Society Is Moving On
headline.print_headline: Head of Asia Society Is Moving On
